messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
You’re live on camera, but try
to act natural, OK?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
The camera is our witness!
It’s recorded our defeat...
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
I’d like to take that footage and
have it broadcast worldwide.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Two Pokémon! If you had two Pokémon,
we’d have a great scene to shoot!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
So, let’s begin and find out what
sort of a Trainer you are!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
You have a superstar quality!
You sure could become a celebrity!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
I lost, but I’m totally thrilled!
We just made some great TV!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Oh, no. What we’re looking for is you
to battle with two Pokémon!
